thread.title_full: Sean Spicer Held A Press Conference With Food In His Teeth â€” Jim Carrey & The Rest Of Twitter Definitely Noticed!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Sean Spicer Held A Press Conference With Food In His Teeth â€” Jim Carrey & The Rest Of Twitter Definitely Noticed!
text:
We don't think Sean Spicer will ever forget to floss again...
Donald Trump 's press secretary had a Katy Perry moment while dodging questions from the media on Monday, when it became clear he had a huge piece of food stuck in his teeth.
And Twitter is totally not gonna let him ever forget this one! Even Jim Carrey had something to say!!
Related: Trump Refuses To Apologize Or Retract Wiretapping Claims 
Sucks to suck, Spicey...
Ch-ch-check out the best responses (below)! 
The rotting food in @PressSec Sean Spicer's teeth is distracting and makes it hard to absorb today's WH misinformation. ;^P pic.twitter.com/oPaA0ziGKN 
â€” Jim Carrey (@JimCarrey) March 27, 2017 
Sean Spicerâ€™s teeth are a sanctuary city for spinach. #PressBriefing pic.twitter.com/JgPelp2Qxx 
â€” Jose Antonio Ojeda (@ojedasbodega) March 27, 2017 
"Lettuce be clear...ðŸ¥—"-sean spicer pic.twitter.com/slflOzO2kn 
â€” teri enciso (@terienciso) March 27, 2017 
Sean Spicer is giving a press conference with a huge chunk of food stuck in his teeth and not ONE reporter has told him ðŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/N7hOwhCrvr 
â€” Kerri Doherty (@squideatsquid) March 27, 2017 
If you pause your tv you can see the rotting food in @PressSec Sean Spicer's teeth... Disgusting and funny at the same time... pic.twitter.com/uWypxuhCxU 
â€” Grand Master Yo'dude (@McIsaac360) March 27, 2017 
Trump is about to burst into the press room and yell YOU HAVE FOOD IN YOUR FUCKING TEETH at Sean Spicer any minute now.
â€” Jesse Berney (@jesseberney) March 27, 2017 
Sean Spicer, giving the White House Press Briefing with food in his teeth... pic.twitter.com/mJKMNJdgyd 
â€” TrumpsTaxes (@TrumpsTaxes) March 27, 2017 
@seanspicer is saving that food in his teeth to spit at the reporter that pisses him off the most today...dude get it together..trainwreck
â€” Brenda B (@crush68) March 27, 2017 
It's appropriate that @PressSec has lettuce in his teeth since he speaks in word salads. #Spicer #Briefing pic.twitter.com/HTbaX0DdS0 
â€” Chris Kennedy (@Chris_Kennedy2) March 27, 2017 
Spicer has something stuck on his bottom teeth, either he just had some lettuce or he is a dipper. #PressBriefing #distracted 
â€” Sol Allen (@solallen) March 27, 2017 
Gotta love how no one in the WH press corp will tell Sean Spicer he has lettuce in his teeth.
â€” Mary Moreland (@MaryMoreland19) March 27, 2017 
I predict @melissamccarthy will have a big leaf of lettuce hanging from her mouth on the next SNL skit. #spicer 
â€” Anthony Medrano (@MariachiSHOW) March 27, 2017 
Welp, when you make a room full of "enemies" -- you better bet they're not going to help you out!
May the bridges we burn light the way! LOLz!
